Content.En: I don't know if you've noticed
Content.Cn: 不知道你有没有留意到

Content.En: Recently, the teaching director has been deliberately causing trouble for students and teachers
Content.Cn: 最近教导主任一直故意找学生和老师的麻烦

Content.En: I don't know what happened to him recently
Content.Cn: 不知道他最近发生了什么事情

Content.En: You are a renowned detective from our school
Content.Cn: 你是我们学校的名侦探

Content.En: Why don't we explore the secrets of the teaching director
Content.Cn: 不如去探索一下教导主任的秘密吧
